Projects

ride_sharing

I made this app as an app to help organize rides to and from events. Users of the app could login and either join a new “team” or make their own “team” Users could then post an event and anyone on their team could see when and where that event is members of that team could then say post if they were giving rides with how many seats they had available in their car and users who needed a ride could click a button on the made ride registering them with that ride and taking on of the available seats.
